pr_title: fix(TBD-11038): The distribution AMAZON_EMR with the version APACHE_2_4_0_EMR doesn't exist

timeline.message: fix(TBD-11038): The distribution AMAZON_EMR with the version APACHE_2_4_0_EMR doesn't exist

timeline.author: amedvedenko

timeline.bodyText: I suggest doing a copy of input list to be safe
timeline.author: amedvedenko

timeline.bodyText: it's enum, application-level constant. Please remove setter. IMO all variables in enums must be final or, at least, API mustn't allow modifying it outside in any way.
timeline.author: amedvedenko

timeline.bodyText: please return copy of the list, to avoid modifications outside of the class
timeline.author: amedvedenko

timeline.bodyText: please put it before the constructor you're referring to
timeline.author: amedvedenko

timeline.bodyText: if it's possible, please, put variables in this enum before the constructors.
timeline.author: amedvedenko
